attributes.additional_details:
With Legal Aid cuts inevitable and the Government encouraging and placing more powers with the Police.  It is essential that a strong, completely new, independent watchdog body is created in order to keep strict observance of the Police to ensure that justice remains true and fair.

A smaller scaled unit which can carry out spot-checks at Police Stations and also based in a community location so that people are able to, if necessary, access it.

KEEP JUSTICE BALANCED.

Please sign my Petition, as it may not affect you or your family today, but who knows what tomorrow brings.

Thank you.
